about_the_game:
The "Idol Hands2 - Digital Artbook" includes the main character illustrations, situational HCG,
and early design sketches that were not shown in the game.

The artbook is 88 pages long and includes:

Introduction to main female characters
Illustrations of all costume variations
Display of facial expressions
Complete collection of HCG, including variations with clothing and nudity
Initial character designs
Contains both Chinese and English languages

How to access:
After purchasing a portion of the artbook, you can find the game in your Steam library.
Right-click on the game, select "Manage," then choose "Browse local files" to find the
"artbook.pdf" file. Click on it to enjoy.

content_descriptors.notes: It contains female nudity and pornographic content, mild violence and other adult content. Please pay attention to it and make sure you are in a suitable place before watching, so as not to cause trouble for others.

name: Idol Hands 2 Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
